text: New Canaan is a wealthy town in Fairfield County, Connecticut, United States. There were 20,622 people according to the 2020 census. The town is one of the richest communities in the nation. In 2011, New Canaan was 8th on CNN Money's list of the top-earning towns in the United States. ==References == Category:Towns in Fairfield County, Connecticut Category:1801 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Connecticut
title: New Canaan, Connecticut
